Dreadlocks Hair (Male)
kDesc
Here's a set of dreads for those of you who grow tired of combing your hair everyday. [#Legal]
Les dreadlocks sont parfaites pour ceux qui en ont marre de se peigner tous les jours. [#Legal]
Ein paar Dreadlocks für alle, die keine Lust mehr haben, sich jeden Tag zu kämmen. [#Legal]
Ecco un'acconciatura a treccine per chi non ne può più di pettinarsi ogni giorno. [#Legal]
Unas buenas rastas para los que se cansan de peinarse todos los días. [#Legal]
매일 아침 머리를 빗기 싫은 남자들을 위해 탄생한 드레드락입니다. [#Legal]
Here's a set of dreads for those of you who grow tired of combing your hair everyday. [#Legal]
這個梳了細髮辮的髮型，適合厭倦了每天梳頭的人。[#Legal]
這個梳了細髮辮的髮型，適合厭倦了每天梳頭的人。[#Legal]
Here's a set of dreads for those of you who grow tired of combing your hair everyday. [#Legal]
